subject: Question
msgSnippet: Anyone using Cactus & weblogic 8? If so, maybe you could help me out. Im getting a class loading error. I put the log4j.ja in my ear file & in the server s
messageBody:
Anyone using Cactus & weblogic 8?

If so, maybe you could help me out.

Im getting a class loading error.
I put the log4j.ja in my ear file & in the server's classpath, not at
the same time & it's giving me this error.

Any ideas? Thanks!
